name: Stuffman: Collector of Things
description:
In this game you play as Stuffman, who has no things or any stuff, and starts with nothing. Bring all 16 items to the box in the center of the map while dodging the persistent enemies to win.

Controls:
WASD to move
Right Click to pick up an item (must be inside grab range, as indicated by white circle around player)
Left Click to throw a held item in the direction of the mouse
